document.full_text: it's official. barry weiss has been named chairman & ceo of island def jam and universal motown republic group. the appointment comes on the heels of antonio "l.a." reid's departure from idj, which was announced today. according to sources, reid is headed to simon cowell's 'the x factor,' where he will serve as judge.
document.title: barry weiss replaces l.a. reid at record label
